alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 9:21PM MDT until April 05 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches overnight with up to 7 inches across the ridge tops and passes. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...The Sawtooth Mountains and Stanley Basin, and the Sun Valley Region. Heavy snow (6 inches or more) should remain above 7500 feet elevation. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
